title: Lore Chunk Front-Matter Schema
description: Schema for YAML front-matter metadata in lore markdown files for content chunking and ingestion

chunk_id.description: Stable identifier for the chunk, provided by authoring tools

audience.description: Audience gating classification per narrative design guidelines

tags.description: Array of canonical tags in category:value format

embedding_hint.description: Optional hint for embedding generation (gated by features.importer_embeddings)

manifest_hash.description: SHA-256 hash of the package manifest

source_path.description: Relative path to the source file within the package

provenance.description: Provenance metadata linking chunk to package manifest
